title: LOOK FOR PLAYERS TO JOIN RANKED TEAM!!
body:
Hey guys basically im creating a ranked team preferably for bronze and silver players. Right now the current roles available are Top, Jungle, ADC and Support. The idea behind the team is not so much to keep winning but to consistently try our best and work on tactics and plays for future games. Basically this ranked team will be a learning experience for players who wanna main certain roles and try and get better at league. 

I am currently Silver 5 and by no means good but i try play consistent and always try to learn and fix mistakes. If you are interested in joining add me in Game (Zezpon)

replies.body: if your still looking ill join 2 accs in sliv5 depends what role you want me to play pref jg supp main udyr ill add u now respond if u want me
I am a sup main but I am extremely strong and confident in top and adc also.
Hey man just added you ingame :)

added.. I'm silver 5

I main supp but im trying to transition to top lane so i might play both

I will add you soon I have a acc in silver 5 and another in b3(was b1 like 3 weeks ago) 
sounds cool I play both adc and sup aswell as jg :)
